name: Matt Was Useless
description:
Do you have the knowledge in arithmetics of an 8-year-old? Do you even know what arithmetics means?

Then this is your game!

Improve an ability that any electronic device can make irrelevant while you help Matt escape the island the fate has trapped him on.

What mysteries await him on the island?

Play now for free and see!

Completely available in english and spanish.

Music by sawsquarenoise licensed under CC BY 4.0. Some of the material is slightly modified.

http://en.sawsquarenoise.com/

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
